name: The Terror that came from Nothing
name_original: The Terror that came from Nothing
description:
This game has been made for the Ludum Dare 45 with the theme "Start with Nothing."

Proramming and art all by Le Don

Use the mouse to play!

Left click: Picking up and using items

Right click: Dropping items

and use Enter to respawn

Even if the enemy seems to be tought and unbeatable, you can do this!

Known issues:

There's no music or soundeffects.
